projects.desc: This app allows the user to easily keep track of their inventory, manage it and have their own catalogue of selling items.
projects.techStack: React JS • Tailwind CSS • Firebase (Backend & Hosting)
projects.name: Storeforce

projects.desc: Bitcloud consumes a cryptocurrency API to show data about digital coins and also is a website that scores 100% across all categories on the Chrome Lighthouse audit report.
projects.name: BitCloud

projects.desc: Devfinder allows to search public info of any github user. This website uses the Github API to fetch the info.
projects.name: Devfinder

projects.desc: With this website any user can track down the geolocation of an IP address or domain name. It fetches the data of the given IP from IPify and then shows the data on a map made with Mapboxgl.
projects.techStack: React • Bootstrap • Mapboxgl • IP Geolocation API • Vercel (Deployment)
projects.name: Findipy
